info.name: TumOnline dark mode + privacy settings
info.description: This theme provides a basic all-black dark mode for TumOnline. It makes lists easier to read by dismissing the unnecessary variant coloring from the light theme.
info.additionalInfo: As this is made from a student some features such as hovering effects and dynamic building are not designed to be darkened and might look strangely. Open source - feel free to contribute.
